entry.title: Vlasov Simulation in Python
entry.summary: In this tutorial we want to simulate a stream of electrons in the Pierce Diode in one dimension using the electrostatic Vlasov-Poisson Equation. When simulating such a scenario, usually computational plasma physicists use either the fluid discription of plasmas, called Magneto Hydrodynmaics (MHD), or the semi-lagrangian Particle-In-Cell method to simulate the Vlasov equation.
